data.name: Pure Farming 2018 - Zetor Major CL 80
data.detailed_description:
Elegant. Stylish. Irreplaceable. Spice up the daily work at your farm with Zetor Major CL 80, designed in collaboration with Italian visionary studio Pininifarina.

Once downloaded, one item of the new machine will be available in the in-game store for free. You can buy more with the in-game currency.
data.about_the_game:
Elegant. Stylish. Irreplaceable. Spice up the daily work at your farm with Zetor Major CL 80, designed in collaboration with Italian visionary studio Pininifarina.

Once downloaded, one item of the new machine will be available in the in-game store for free. You can buy more with the in-game currency.
data.short_description: Elegant. Stylish. Irreplaceable. Spice up the daily work at your farm with Zetor Major CL 80, designed in collaboration with Italian visionary studio Pininifarina.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I7, 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
